posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dennis Lane
I purchased these sets from Larry Fritsch over the past few years.  Included in parenthesis is his current prices he is asking.  All are excellent or better.

Trade Card($4.95) 1869 Peck & Snyder Cincinnati Red Stockings..$2 + $1.50 postage

N28 and N29 ($6.95) Allen & Ginter World's Champions (16 cards)..$3 +$2.50 postage

N43 ($4.95) A & G 2nd series LARGE (6 cards)..$2 + $1.50 postage

N162 ($4.95) Goodwin Champions (8 cards)..$2 + $1.50 postage

N172 ($9.95 ea. series) Old Judges (4 series @ 20 cards each)..$10 +$2.50 postage

N300 ($12.95) 1895 Mayo Cut Plug (40 cards)..$5 +$2.50 postage

N370 ($5.95) 1887 Lone Jack St Louis Browns (13 cards)..$3 + $1.50 postage


All 7 issues...$20 + $5 shipping..e-mail lanesouthsided@yahoo.com.  Thanks Dennis

SOLD!

Posted By: Joe_G.
I'll take the OJ Reprints.

Best Regards,
Joe Gonsowski
